bio: No longer bound by the limits of the mind, his original ideas are enough to rattle the fabric of the universe.

soultimate.name: Power Blink
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Attack by 25%, Defense by 175%, movement speed by 20% and Move Meter speed by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Recover all HP and all stats are greatly increased.

skill.effect: All allies' Spr up by 10% and Str down by 5%.
skill.name: CEO's Blessing

name: Hinozall Awoken
